lenders.name: Alex

We believe in the power of giving less and helping more. 
We believe giving money away adds to wealth rather than diminishing it.
We believe in giving a hand up over a handout.
And if not us, then who?
lenders.occupational_info:
I'm just a guy who gets up every day excited to continue my life's work: serving others by teaching them the most practical, efficient, and effective ways to live their dreams. 

And SMARTSTART is all about sharing our knowledge, our lessons learned, our time and professional guidance, and our hearts with others. In reality, we are all one and there is only now.

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: People should not have to endure the conditions that they do in developing countries.  They also work very hard and very long hours to make minimal profit, and we should not take what we have for granted.
lenders.occupational_info: I work 12 hour shifts and help in the steelmaking and finishing process.  The steel we make is used for all sorts of projects, from automotive to construction, to tinfoil, etc, etc.

lenders.name: Craig
lenders.loan_because: Hey. I'm Craig. Having been lucky enough to do some volunteer work overseas in a few countries I have seen what a massive difference microloans can make. Every loan has the potential to not only impact an individual, but their family and community too. Kiva is a very clever initiative, and one I feel is well worth supporting. Prior to lending, I encourage lenders to look at the details of their loans, and in particular at the interest rates the community banks are passing on to the borrowers. Some microlenders can charge exorbitant rates and I feel it is important for lenders on this site to look a little more deeply into their involvement and how to operate with maximum impact and ethics.

lenders.name: Marwa
lenders.loan_because: i think we all should be cooperating for a better world and for a better life. Giving a little from what we have may benefit us all..

lenders.name: Vincent

lenders.occupational_info: energy healing.

lenders.name: Raymond S. Badarzynski Memorial Fund
lenders.loan_because: This fund is in memory of Uncle Ray - a person that stands out in my memory as always willing to lend a helping hand, a smile and a brighter day to anyone in need. It is our hope that others around the world can help achieve their hopes and dreams with a little help from the memory of Uncle Ray. All monies in this account will be donated to stroke research at the closing of this KIVA account - hopefully a few years from now...

lenders.occupational_info: Our goal is to develop, demonstrate and implement a model ecologically sustainable village that can serve as the template for growth in the developing nations. Ecologically sustainable villages can provide quality housing, sustainable lifestyles and help reduce the migration of people into already overloaded urban centers.

lenders.name: Daniel

lenders.occupational_info: Stevia blends toxic soap out of water, creating what I call pure h2o.  Pure h2o has made my body run faster than most black pro athletes in American football, and lean and ripped with little to no fat on my body.

lenders.loan_because: It is a great way to help small businesses grow and hopefully prosper with very little downside exposure on my part.
